member.name: T:JetBrains.DocumentTests.Src.TestLineIndexIncremental
member.summary: Assert that incremental updates to the line index on document modifications result in the same effect as full rescan.

member.name: M:JetBrains.DocumentTests.Src.TestLineIndexIncremental.AssertConsistent(JetBrains.DocumentModel.IDocument)
member.summary: Asserts that the doc line index that has been incrementally updated is consistent with full rescan results.
